Latest Email & Text Message Announcements
-----------------------------------------

* [January 26 Weekly Announcements](https://rss.finalsiteconnect.com/147773/ellagoannouncements/76673663.xml)

  Good evening! Here are your January 26 Weekly Announcements.
  Parks Board Meeting on January 27 at 6:30pm
  City Council Meeting on February 4 at 7pm
  Volunteer Fair on Saturday, February 7 at 9am at McNair Park Pavilion
  The city is always looking for volunteers, and we truly cannot make things happen without the help of our community! Please come check out the Volunteer Fair to learn how you can give back and get involved with your city. Coffee and donuts provided!
* [January 18th Updates](https://rss.finalsiteconnect.com/147773/ellagoannouncements/76590044.xml)

  Here are your January 18th updates:
  Monday, January 19 City Offices closed in observance of Martin Luther King Jr Day
  Wednesday, January 21 City Council Meeting Cancelled
  Tuesday, January 27 Parks Board Meeting 6:30 pm
  Now accepting applications for a place on the ballot for the May 2nd city elections until February 13.

#### City of El Lago

411 Tallowood Drive  
El Lago, TX 77586

Phone: [281-326-1951](tel:281-326-1951)

#### Office Hours

Monday – Thursday: 9 am to 5 pm    
Friday: 9 am to Noon
